section.name: Hippo Repository JCR/WebDAV Support
section.p: This module supports JCR/WebDAV connections for Hippo Repository. So, you can use JCR APIs against remote Hippo Repository via JCR over WebDAV connections by using this module.

p.em: WARNING: However, this module does not support Hippo specific virtual node related APIs and workflow APIs.

section.name: Demo Application
section.p: You can check out, build and run demo application, which contains all the examples explained in this site documentation.
Here are example commands to check out, build and run demo application:

div.source: $ svn checkout https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/hipporepojcrdav/hipporepojcrdav-demo/trunk hipporepojcrdav-demo-TRUNK $ cd hipporepojcrdav-demo-TRUNK $ mvn clean install $ mvn -P cargo.run

section.p: Visit http://localhost:8080/site/ and try 'JCR/WebDAV Example 1', 'JCR/WebDAV Example 2' and ''JCR/WebDAV Example 3'. Each source file of those can be found in '/site/examples/about1.jsp', '/site/examples/about2.jsp', and '/site/examples/about3.jsp'.
